name: Advanced Neural Circuit
description: A rare material used for research. A process that's vastly more advanced than a common neural circuit.

name: Anode Ion Particle
description: A rare material used for research. This high-level technology is needed to refine an ion particle with a balanced anode.

name: Artificial Biometal
description: A rare material used for research. A specialized alloy created by emulating the muscles of an organism.

name: Balanced Plasma Battery
description: A rare material used for research. The balanced energy within the atom allows it to last much longer than average plasmas.

name: Carbon Crystal
description: A rare material used for research. A material created by combining multiple carbon atoms.

name: Ceramic Composite
description: A rare material used for research. A material created by refining natural ceramic obtained from the oldest region in Ingris.

name: Common Carbon Activator
description: A rare material used for research. A substance that triggers the activity of organic matter using carbon compounds.

name: Complex Carbon Activator
description: A rare material used for research. A substance that triggers the activity of organic matter using complex carbon compounds.

name: Compound Carbon Activator
description: A rare material used for research. A catalyst made by stacking thick layers of compound carbon crystals. It is a highly reactive material.

name: Compound Coating Material
description: A rare material used for research. A substance known for its exceptional insulation.

name: Conductive Metallic Foil
description: A rare material used for research. An extremely compressed metallic foil that allows electricity to flow through more easily.

name: Cooling Metallic Foil
description: A rare material used for research. A metallic foil with superb cooling performance used for creating various devices.

name: Crystal Biogel
description: A rare material used for research. An artificial biotissue comprised of a complex crystal structure.

name: Data Processing Neural Circuit
description: A rare material used for research. A network based on an organism's cranial nerve tissue.

name: Deformed Biometal
description: A rare material used for research. A rare biometal deformed by various powerful energies.

name: Divided Plasma Battery
description: A rare material used for research. A device that stores energy generated by plasma division.

name: Encrypted Neural Circuit
description: A rare material used for research. A neural circuit that includes the Magister's password system.

name: Energy Control Core
description: A rare material used for research. A component that controls energy. Since it's harmful when it touches the body, it comes with a special anchor.

name: Flectorite
description: A rare material used for research. A special substance that has the characteristics of a fluid even though it's an ore.

name: Fusion Plasma Battery
description: A rare material used for research. An electricity storage device made by storing substances in a plasma state.

name: Hardener
description: A rare material used for research. Adding it during refining increases hardness by forming strong bonds.

name: Heat Plasma Battery
description: A rare material used for research. A battery created by making a convertor substance into a plasma. It contains ample energy despite its size.

name: Hellion
description: A rare material used for research. A helium-refined gas substance used for creating various devices.

name: High Precision Exchange Components
description: A rare material used for research. An exchangeable component that's had its modules set to work for many different firearms.

name: Highly Concentrated Energy Residue
description: A rare material used for research. A rare highly-concentrated energy residue that can be an effective catalyst for creating a special organic compound.

name: Inorganic Biogel
description: A rare material used for research. An artificial biotissue comprised of an inorganic matter.

name: Insulated Metallic Foil
description: A rare material used for research. A foil made with extremely thinly-pressed metal alloys.

name: Liquid Metal
description: A rare material used for research. The liquefied metal can be used with superalloys to be refined into various shapes.

name: Low Carbon Activator
description: A rare material used for research. A specialized catalyst that forcibly activates the energy of organic matter.

name: Macromolecule Biogel
description: A rare material used for research. A biogel made of macromolecules with more complex structures.

name: Metal Accelerant
description: A rare material used for research. This catalyst is used to maximize the reacting during metal refining.

name: Mixed Energy Residue
description: A rare material used for research. A residue remaining in the biotissue after various energies are mixed.

name: Monad Shard
description: A rare material used for research. Particles of minerals obtained from various places.

name: Monomolecular Extractor
description: A rare material used for research.This allows you to extract molecules from certain objects.

name: Multi Composite Receivers
description: A rare material used for research. A receiver component that's had its modules set to work for many different firearms.

name: Murky Energy Residue
description: A rare material used for research. A biotissue mutated due to powerful energy.

name: Nano Compound
description: A rare material used for research. A special material comprised of nanomolecular structures used as one of the raw materials for a Reactor.

name: Nanopolymers
description: A rare material used for research. Considered some king of a fluid, this is a specialized particle that can be refined into various forms.

name: Negative Ion Particle
description: A rare material used for research. An ion particle in a negative state that can be used for creating various substances.

name: Organic Biogel
description: A rare material used for research. Artificial biotissues are tangled up like a spiderweb.

name: Polyatomic Ion Particle
description: A rare material used for research. A recently discovered ion particle formed with multiple particles and is used for creating various devices.

name: Positive Ion Particle
description: A rare material used for research. An ion particle made by an extremely compressed charge.

name: Pure Energy Residue
description: A rare material used for research. A pure energy residue found in organic matter exposed to high energy.

name: Quantum Crystal
description: A rare material used for research. A substance that embodies the crystal structures of a minuscule quantum unit.

name: Repton
description: A rare material used for research. This new material was created by refining an amalgamation of extremely fine particles.

name: Reverse Charging Coil
description: A rare material used for research. A coil designed to allow electricity to flow backward.

name: Semi Permanent Plasma
description: A rare material used for research. This continuously heated plasma enables refining into various forms.

name: Shape Memory Alloy
description: A rare material used for research. A special alloy that can return to its original shape when exposed to heat energy.

name: Silicon
description: A rare material used for research. A specialized chemical material that can be acquired by refining ores with identical names.

name: Solenoid
description: A rare material used for research. It is a small generator that supplies energy to mechanisms.

name: Specialized Biometal
description: A rare material used for research. An alloy with excellent elasticity like the muscles of an organism.

name: Superalloy
description: A rare material used for research. The metal was extracted from Kuiper and is hard and light.

name: Superconductor Core
description: A rare material used for research. It has minimal energy loss duo to zero electrical resistance.

name: Superfluid
description: A rare material used for research. A special non-viscous fluid that doesn't flow.

name: Synthesized Artificial Biometal
description: A rare material used for research. A substance made by synthesizing organic matter and metal to emulate an organism.

name: Thermal Metallic Foil
description: A rare material used for research. A basic metallic foil created by mixing mierals that can maintain a high temperature.

name: Void Organism
description: A rare material obtained by dismantling Colossus parts. It has both mineral and organic properties.

name: Energy Activators
description: A mechanism that reacts to Arche and Ecive. It amplifies the energy supplied to a Module Socket.

name: Crystallization Catalyst
description: A catalyst with a property of absorbing and crystallizing various energy sources. Resets the target's level and can be used to assign socket types to modules upon use.

name: Phase Exchanger
description: A specialized device that can replace the level of Common and Rare Firearms through Transmission. It utilizes the advanced technology of the Magisters who manipulate Phase.

name: Adjustment Control Axis
description: An axis that controls the properties of Common and Rare Firearms. Helps control the unique characteristics of Firearms.

name: Ion Accelerator
description: A unique equipment that can enhance Common and Rare Reactors. Accelerates ions to significantly increase an object's response time.

name: Precision Phase Exchanger
description: A specialized device that can replace the level of Ultimate Firearms through Tranmission. It posseses the ability to simultaneously calculate and process multiple Phases using Magister's technology.

name: Fine Adjustment Control Axis
description: An axis that controls the properties of Ultimate Firearms. It boasts precise performance, allowing for nanometer-scale fine adjustments.

name: Precise Ion Accelerator
description: A rare device that can enhance Ultimate Reactors. It dramatically increases the response speed of objects through ion acceleration.
